page.title: 10Eastgate Market
page.content: Eastgate Market is at the junction of Sea Lane and Roman Bank.There are 100 to 200 stalls depending on what time of the summer season it is.The market is part of a holiday centre and is open on Thursdays,Fridays,Saturdays and Mondays.Some stall holders arrive at 5 a.m. to get a good pitch.The busiest times are Bank Holidays and when the children have broken up from school in August.Many of the traders bring their stalls and stay in caravans for the season on the camp site.Holiday makers mainly buy beach games but there is a choice of food, clothes,ornaments,tools,fishing equipment,kitchen utensils,rugs,etc. Most people come from local caravan sites but some customers come on bus trips from the Midlands.There are free buses from Skegness and Chapel St. Leonards.
